specials_info:
There is a large black coffin...
 If you open it: A Vampire Lord rises from the coffin...
 Battle vs. [1 Vampire Lord]

Two sleeping dragons awaken...
 Battle vs. [1 Red Dragon, 1 Red Dragon]

Magic Mouth Riddle:

 Name the greatest son of Odin and win his aid

 Answer: THOR
 Item: THOR FGN
When you step on this square, each door turns into a wall and each wall into a door, thus allowing you to progress to the stairs.
